snippet.title: Shooty Shooty Official Trailer: Conquer the Abyss in this Action-Packed Rogue-lite Survival Game
snippet.description:
Play Now: https://www.spatial.io/s/Shooty-Shooty-65020b034b3117f026aa55be?share=8704828209464503502

Learn More: https://Shooty.gg

*Spatial Halloween SZN is HERE 🎃*
    
After two months of development — descend into a nest of evil in SHOOTY SHOOTY 💀 An action-packed rogue-lite survival game crafted by @ alanspatial using the Spatial Creator Toolkit!
    
Face endless waves of enemies as you strategically upgrade your abilities.
    
Play now for free at https://shooty.gg and conquer the abyss…or die trying!

______________________________________________________________________________

Unleash your creativity with Spatial! Explore worlds, create characters, play games and connect with millions across the globe from web, mobile, and VR.

Learn More: https://Spatial.io
Build with the Unity SDK: https://Docs.Spatial.io
Twitter/X: https://X.com/@Spatial_io
Instagram: https://Instagram.com/Spatial_io
Discord: https://Discord.gg/Spatial
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/spatial.io
Support: https://Support.Spatial.io
